languages.text: "Насчет безопасности вы слегка преувеличиваете, Ваша Светлость, но я безусловно рад, что больше не болтаюсь на кольях и крюках словно туша грокса. Видать, еще послужу Императору денек-другой". {n}Вигастис пытается усмехнуться, но закашливается, сплевывая кровь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Насчет безопасности вы слегка преувеличиваете, Ваша Светлость, но я безусловно рад, что больше не болтаюсь на кольях и крюках словно туша грокса. Видать, еще послужу Императору денек-другой". {n}Вигастис пытается усмехнуться, но закашливается, сплевывая кровь.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Safe may be too strong a word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Насчет безопасности вы слегка преувеличиваете, Ваша Светлость, но я безусловно рад, что больше не болтаюсь на кольях и крюках словно туша грокса. Видать, еще послужу Императору денек-другой". {n}Вигастис пытается усмехнуться, но закашливается, сплевывая кровь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I'd say you're exaggerating about my safety, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It seems I get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「陛下、安全という言葉は言い過ぎかもしれませんが、蜥蜴牛の死骸のように杭やフックにぶら下がっていないのは確かに気分がいいものです。もう1、2日は皇帝に仕えることができそうです」{n}ヴィガステスは笑おうとしたが、代わりに咳き込み血を吐いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Safe may be too strong a word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、安全という言葉は言い過ぎかもしれませんが、蜥蜴牛の死骸のように杭やフックにぶら下がっていないのは確かに気分がいいものです。もう1、2日は皇帝に仕えることができそうです」{n}ヴィガステスは笑おうとしたが、代わりに咳き込み血を吐いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “‘安然无恙’这个词恐怕有点夸大其辞了，大人。但话说回来，不用再像一头挨宰的格洛克斯兽被吊在木桩和钩子上，这种感觉确实不错。看来，我可以再侍奉帝皇一两天了。”{n}维加斯特试着笑起来，但却咳了口血。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Safe may be too strong a word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “‘安然无恙’这个词恐怕有点夸大其词了，大人。但话说回来，不用再像一头挨宰的格洛克斯兽被吊在木桩和钩子上，这种感觉确实不错。看来，我可以再侍奉帝皇一两天了。”{n}维加斯特试着笑起来，但却咳了口血。{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Igual decir que estoy a salvo es exagerar, pero sienta bien no estar colgando de estacas y ganchos como el cadáver de un grox. Parece que podré servir al Emperador uno o dos días más». {n}Vigastes intenta reírse, lo que le hace toser sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Safe may be too strong a word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Diría que está exagerando sobre mi seguridad, pero sienta bien no estar colgando de estacas y ganchos como el cadáver de un grox. Parece que podré servir al Emperador uno o dos días más». {n}Vigastes intenta reírse, lo que le hace toser sangre.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Sicher mag ein zu starkes Wort sein, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber es ist wirklich ein gutes Gefühl, nicht wie ein Grox-Kadaver an einem Haken zu baumeln. Wie's aussieht, darf ich dem Imperator wohl noch ein paar Tage dienen." {n}Vigastes versucht zu lachen, spuckt stattdessen aber nur Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Safe may be too strong a word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde sagen, dass Ihr übertreibt, was meine Sicherheit angeht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber es ist wirklich ein gutes Gefühl, nicht wie ein Grox-Kadaver an einem Haken zu baumeln. Ich darf dem Imperator wohl noch ein, zwei Tage dienen." {n}Vigastes versucht zu lachen, spuckt stattdessen aber nur Blut.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Autant niveau sécurité j'ai connu mieux, Votre Seigneurie, autant je dois avouer que ça fait du bien de ne plus être suspendu à des crochets comme une carcasse de grox. On dirait bien que je vais pouvoir servir l'Empereur un ou deux jours de plus. » {n}Vigastes essaie de rire, mais est pris d'une quinte de toux qui lui fait cracher du sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Safe may be too strong a word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Autant niveau sécurité j'ai connu mieux, Votre Seigneurie, autant je dois avouer que ça fait du bien de ne plus être suspendu à des crochets comme une carcasse de grox. On dirait bien que je vais pouvoir servir l'Empereur un ou deux jours de plus. » {n}Vigastes essaie de rire, mais est pris d'une quinte de toux qui lui fait cracher du sang.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Güvende olmak biraz iddialı kaçabilir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak kazık ve kancalara groks leşi gibi asılmamak güzel bir hismiş. Görünüşe göre İmparator'a birkaç gün daha hizmet edebileceğim." {n}Kıkırdamaya çalışan Vigastes'in bu çabası, kan öksürmekle sonuçlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Safe may be too strong a word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but it certainly feels good not to be dangling from stakes and hooks like a grox carcass. It looks like I'll get to serve the Emperor for another day or two." {n}Vigastes tries to chuckle, which makes him cough up blood instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Güvende olmak biraz iddialı bir laf olabilir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak kazık ve kancalara groks leşi gibi asılmamak güzel bir hismiş. Görünüşe göre İmparator'a birkaç gün daha hizmet edebileceğim." {n}Vigastes, kıkırdamaya çalışıyor ancak bu çabası, kan öksürmekle sonuçlanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
